info.title: ListFlowHQ API
info.description: Consolidated API specification for the ListFlowHQ backend (formerly eBay Sales Tool). This file is generated; edit fragment .swagger.json files under backend/src/swagger and run generate_swagger.js.

post.summary: Create a new role-page access entry

get.summary: Get an app config record by ID
Get a catalog item by ID
Get a communication log by ID
Get a database configuration record by ID
Get an eBay info record by ID
Get a financial tracking record by ID
Get an order details record by ID
Get an ownership record by ID
Get an ownership agreement by ID
Get a performance metrics record by ID
Get a return history record by ID
Get all role page access records

200.description: List of role page access records

post.summary: Create a role page access record

get.summary: Get a role page access record by ID

put.summary: Update a role page access record

delete.summary: Delete a role page access record

get.summary: Get a sales record by ID
Get a shipping log record by ID
Get an application account by ID

post.summary: Ingest raw eBay listing payloads (comma-separated IDs) and persist raw data.
post.description: Retrieves raw listing payloads from eBay. When dryRun=true, nothing is written to the database; the summary reflects the simulated outcome.

itemIds.description: Comma or whitespace separated list of eBay listing item IDs.

example.message: At least one itemId is required

post.summary: Execute the raw->domain mapping pipeline over new/unmapped items.
post.description: Runs the mapping pass. When dryRun=true, performs read-only simulation and returns a summary without persisting domain entities.

maxItems.description: Optional cap on number of raw items to map this run.

200.description: Mapping run completed (success, partial, or failed).

logs.description: Key log lines or messages from the run.

example.message: maxItems must be a positive integer

requested.description: Count of IDs provided in the request.

fetched.description: Count of IDs successfully fetched from eBay API.

succeeded.description: Count of raw payloads successfully processed (pre-insert).

inserted.description: Number of new raw rows inserted (non-dry run).

duplicates.description: Rows skipped due to existing identical payload hash.

errors.description: Count of hard errors encountered per item.

invalidIds.description: Number of provided IDs failing basic validation regex.

transientErrors.description: Errors deemed retryable (may have succeeded after retry).

permanentErrors.description: Errors deemed non-retryable resulting in item failure.

retries.description: Total retry attempts performed across all items.

backpressureDelays.description: Number of times ingestion paused due to near rate limit depletion.

avgAttempts.description: Average fetch attempts per successfully fetched item (includes initial).

durationMs.description: Total elapsed time of retrieval in milliseconds.

selected.description: Raw rows selected for this run prior to filtering (matches processed + maybe early filtered).

dryRun.description: Whether the mapping run executed in dry-run mode (duplicated at top-level for convenience).

limit.description: Batch processing limit used for this run.

AdminApiKey.name: X-Admin-Auth
AdminApiKey.description: Admin API key required for protected /api/admin/ebay endpoints.

UnauthorizedError.description: Unauthorized  missing or invalid admin API key
